sourcesContent:
import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { FormBuilder, FormGroup, Validators } from '@angular/forms'; import { DatePipe } from '@angular/common'; @Component({ template: ``, }) export class OrdersComponent { } @Component({ templateUrl: './order-list.component.html', styleUrls: ['./orders.component.css'] }) export class OrderListComponent { orders: any; } @Component({ templateUrl: './new-order.component.html', styleUrls: ['./orders.component.css'], providers: [DatePipe] }) export class NewOrderComponent { orderForm: any; currentDate = new Date(); products: Array<{ id: number, name: string, category: string, size: number, quantity: number, price: number }> = [ { id: 1, name: "First", category: "Test", size: 5, quantity: 2, price: 50 }, { id: 2, name: "Second", category: "Test", size: 15, quantity: 1, price: 50 }, ]; total = 0; currFormater = new Intl.NumberFormat('en-US', { style: 'currency', currency: 'USD', }); constructor(private formBuilder: FormBuilder) { this.CreateForm(); } CreateForm() { this.orderForm = this.formBuilder.group({ 'orderNumber': [''], 'orderDate': [this.currentDate.toLocaleDateString()], 'customer': ['', [Validators.required]], 'status': ['', [Validators.required]], 'totalCost': [this.currFormater.format(this.getTotal())], 'products': [], 'comment': [''] }); } saveOrder(): void { if (this.orderForm.dirty && this.orderForm.valid) { console.log(this.orderForm.value); } } getTotal(): number { let total = 0; for (const element of this.products) { total += element.quantity * element.price; } return total; } }
